title: fiach_dubh
author: fiach_dubh
created_time: October 31, 2022, 12:02:06 AMLast edit: November 01, 2022, 11:57:15 PM by fiach_dubh
content: UPDATE: PUZZLE HAS BEEN SOLVED. Congrats to the winner!Hello!Happy 14th Birthday to the Bitcoin Whitepaper!To honor this day, I would like to re-introduce this video mashup puzzle I made for last years Whitepaper Day. Last year there were 13 million SATS (0.13 Bitcoin) up for grabs hidden within the mashup video. To date, the reward has gone unclaimed. Therefore the reward has increased to 14 million SATS (0.14 Bitcoin) and the difficulty has decreased since there are some more new clues in this version!I will say no more other than, you can find some other clues in this thread from last year: https://www.reddit.com/r/Bitcoin/comments/qjo9b0/run_itcoin_run_happy_13th_birthday_to_the_bithttps://youtu.be/kbRhr2ITblU

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: You might want to change the "$@$" in the title to say either "satoshis" or make it just read 0.14BTC because the way the topic is currently formulated, makes it sound like you're giving away $14 million dollars (which would have been an obvious scam since nobody gives away such amounts).

comments.author: fiach_dubh
comments.body: Quote from: NotATether on October 31, 2022, 05:42:17 AMYou might want to change the "$@$" in the title to say either "satoshis" or make it just read 0.14BTC because the way the topic is currently formulated, makes it sound like you're giving away $14 million dollars (which would have been an obvious scam since nobody gives away such amounts).changed. ty for the feedback. didn't think of that.
